title: Art and Picture Book Activity: The Match Woman
copy: Create your very own portrait using unconventional materials and objects, just like Francis Picabia did in this painting. Explore the read aloud link for “Walter was Worried” by Laura Vaccaro Seeger to make connections between portraiture and personalities. Designed especially for young learners, this resource offers creative ideas for looking at and responding to art together.   Illinois Early Learning Standards: Learning Standard 2.D Establish personal connection with books. Learning Standard 4.B Demonstrate an emerging knowledge and understanding of the alphabet.
